level.heading: Authorization for the establishment of city business improvement districts.
level.text: * ยง 25-401 Authorization for the establishment of city business improvement districts. Pursuant to the provisions of section nine hundred eighty of the general municipal law, business improvement districts shall be established and extended as hereinafter provided. * NB Amended by L.L. 78/85, language juxtaposed per Ch. 907/85 ยง 14
